name: Consult AGA
tag_list: technical-writing, program-management, offshore, onshore, marketing, project-management, storage, writing, editing, copywriting
overview:
Founded in San Jose, CA, Consult AGA is a dynamic company led by industry veterans in Software and Hardware Engineering, and Program Management.

With Consult AGA, you will have access to a team of experts with over a decade of experience working with Fortune 500 companies.

Using industry recognized methodologies to manage large products and engineering principles to design, implement, and document leading edge technology.

Consult AGA specialize in:

a) Technical Writing: Engineering Documentation (Architectural, Functional, Design Specifications) Data Sheets Installation Guides Quick Start Guides Web Content Presentations Template creation Standardization

B) Program Management: Quality, Cost, Delivery (QCD) Business Justification Cost Analysis Risk Management Scheduling Team Management Meeting Management Change Control
